headline.0: We Don't Need Double Standards for Iranian-Americans

short_description.0: As Iranian-Americans, we and our community leaders should have the self-confidence to speak out against all forms of injustice perpetrated against the Iranian people, especially when lives are at stake. That is a unifying cause worthy all of us.

authors.0: Marjan Keypour Greenblatt, ContributorCo-Founder, Alliance for Rights of All Minorities (ARAM)
